### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure that the target location is clear before attempting to place a boiler. Check for any obstructing entities.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Verify that the pipe connection points are valid and within range before attempting to connect pipes. Ensure that the path between the two connection points is unobstructed.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
